apiClassifier.shortdesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that an index of some sort (such as to an array) is out of range.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that an index of some sort (such as to an array) is out of range.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, creates a new IndexOutOfBoundsError instance.

apiParam.apiDesc: A string associated with the error object.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, creates a new IndexOutOfBoundsError instance.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The error that is thrown by methods that have detected concurrent modification of an object when such modification is not permissible.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The error that is thrown by methods that have detected concurrent modification of an object when such modification is not permissible.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, creates a new ConcurrentModificationError instance.

apiParam.apiDesc: A string associated with the error object.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, creates a new ConcurrentModificationError instance.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that there are no more elements in the iteration.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that there are no more elements in the iteration.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, creates a new NoSuchElementError instance.

apiParam.apiDesc: A string associated with the error object.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, creates a new NoSuchElementError instance.
